iep_goals: Complete multi-paragraph essays with clear thesis statements and supporting evidence with 75% accuracy
Demonstrate comprehension of grade-level texts through written responses with 80% accuracy
accommodations: Extended time on tests and assignments (time and a half)
Use of spell-check and grammar-check software
Access to audio versions of textbooks
Note-taking assistance or copies of teacher notes
learning_styles: benefits from graphic organizers and visual supports
learns best through discussion and verbal processing

interviews.parent: Parent reports Alexis works extremely hard but reading takes much longer than peers. She's interested in becoming a social worker.
interviews.teacher: Alexis participates actively in class discussions but struggles with written assignments and reading comprehension.

observations.psychologist: Above-average verbal reasoning with significant deficits in reading fluency and written expression. Strong motivation and work ethic.
